parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the speedometer and gauge cluster can cause inaccurate readings, leading to potential safety risks, such as speeding or losing control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The speedometer fails to provide accurate readings
the speedometer sticks or freezes at a specific speed
the fuel gauge fails to provide accurate readings

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering shaft can cause a loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Popping noise when turning and slowing down
vibration of the steering wheel at high speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause a loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: vibration of the steering wheel at high speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Pressure Loss and Vehicle Instability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of tire air pressure can cause the vehicle to become unstable, leading to loss of control, spinning, and potential accidents, especially when driving in wet conditions or making turns.
symptoms: especially in rainy conditions; loss of tire air pressure.
